description:
Kenshiro and Raoh face off at the most holy of training grounds in the 2,000 year history of the North Star, The North Star Mind and Body Training Ground. Kenshiro possesses the Unconscious Transmigration, which only those who bear sadness can learn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen-jou wa Hokuto Renkitouza! Mou Dare mo Yatsura o Tomerarenai!!
Showdown at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground! No One Can Stop Them Now!!
Ultime combat au temple de formation du Hokuto ! Plus personne ne les arrêtera !!
決戦場は北斗練気闘座! もう誰も奴らをとめられない!!
